ai-tha-ap346:0.3_0: The Elder Tissa related the Pabbajjā ordination
ai-tha-ap346:1.2_0: his name is the Buddha of the Earth,
ai-tha-ap346:1.4_0: The value of the value of the road.
ai-tha-ap346:2.1_0: There are three bejewels that are full of flowers.
ai-tha-ap346:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap346:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap346:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Timbaruka.
ai-tha-ap346:6.1_0: The fourth Elder Tissa Makkhali (Tissa’s) sons, (Tissaka),
